attributes.action: HOLD A REFERENDUM TO COME OUT OF EEC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EEC is not as put to the country at first. It was said it was only for trading not all this polital rule making etc..These EEC budgets cost far too much and too much interference in member countrys .Hold a ballet let the people decide

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
